review: I wish I had one years ago. This is so convenient for me when I want to watch Netflix. I used to have to go thru the wii game console  to do that but it's easier, quicker and simple to access with Apple TV. I also watch a lot of HBO and again, much easier than going thru the comcast tuner. I really enjoy using my lolo exercise apps on it too! This works with my iPhone which has "airplay" and when I turn on the "mirror" switch, the lolo app will display on the tv screen! The Apple tv is super easy to set up, and if I misplace the remote that comes with it, I can use my iPhone as a remote!!

review: In the past, I always used my Wii to stream Netflix and that was really a pain.  The remote for the Wii was hard to use to click what I wanted to.  However, the Apple TV remote is simple and very easy to use.  I also downloaded an app on my iPhone that lets me use my iPhone as a remote for the Apple TV.  I can also use the Apple TV to put whatever is on my iPhone or MacBook Pro onto the TV (mirroring).  I love that I can play my music that's on my phone or computer through my TV by streaming it to my Apple TV.  I also love how many apps it has.  I can watch Netflix, HBO Go, Hulu, and even some of my movies that I have in iTunes on my computer.This product really works best if you have other Apple products to use it with.  I love the Apple TV, but I probably would have purchased the Roku if I didn't have a Mac laptop and an iPhone simply because it's cheaper than the Apple TV is.
